title: Monitoring Stack with Prometheus & Grafana
description: Builds a robust monitoring stack on AWS EKS using Prometheus, Grafana, kube-state-metrics, node-exporter, and CloudWatch. Focuses on real-world observability and cost-aware production setups.

title: Fintech Payments Simulation
description: A serverless payments API on AWS with full CI/CD, monitoring, and shift-left security. Built using real infrastructure-as-code and GitHub Actions.

title: BoostPoint WordPress Infrastructure
description: A highly available, modular WordPress deployment on AWS using Terraform. Built with DevOps best practices and walkthrough videos.

title: Logistics Tracking Platform
description: End-to-end tracking system using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and Terraform. Features CI/CD with GitHub Actions and monitoring via Grafana.

title: Secure Banking CI/CD Pipeline
description: A secure CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions, AWS Fargate, and OWASP tools. Tailored for high-security industries like finance.

title: FortiStack Secure Cloud-Native CI/CD
description: A complete DevSecOps pipeline from scratch with Terraform, Docker, EKS, and GitHub Actions. Focuses on secure Kubernetes deployments.
